reviewText: My grandson loves this series.  He watches them over and over again.  I hope there will be more for his collection.

If you ride quads or bikes, this is a fun DVd to have in your collection.

Just goes to show anything can be done on an ATV that can be done on a dirt bike....

Kids will enjoy this as well...good family fun, no foul language....even the music is edit for such things....

Cannot go wrong with Fallout Vol 1 - Vol 3!!!
